#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;
#define MAXN 4000050

// Function : To calculate the LPS array from the Text
void computeLPS(string pat,int * lps,int M)
{
	lps[0] = 0;			// First position is always 0
	int len = 0, i = 1;
	
	while(i < M)
	{
		if(pat[i] == pat[len])
		{
			len++;
			lps[i] = len;
			i++;
		}
		else
		{
			if(len != 0)
				len = lps[len-1];
			
			else
			{
				lps[i] = 0;
				i = i+1;
			}
		}
	}
	return;
}

void solve()
{
	char * str = (char *) malloc(MAXN * sizeof(char));
	string ee = "End";
	string ss;
	
	while(1)
	{
		scanf("%s",str);
		
		if(strcmp(str,ee.c_str()) == 0)
			break;
		else
		{
			ss = str;
		///	cout << ss << endl;
			int M = ss.length();
			int * lps = (int *) malloc (M*sizeof(int));
			
			computeLPS(ss,lps,M);
			for(int i = 0; i < M; i++)
				printf("%d ",lps[i]);
			printf("\n");
			free(lps);
		}
	}	
	
	free(str);
	return;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	solve();
	return 0;
}
